page.title: 11Domesday Statistics 2
page.content: The{type of work}done is, clerical - 14.94%, professional - 27.59%, industrial - 11.49%, representatives - 4.6%, service industries - 13.79% and other - 20.69%. There are no workers in agriculture.{Annual income groups are - below Â£5000 - 17.24%, Â£5 - 10000 - 25.29%, Â£10 - 20000 - 37.93% and over Â£20000 - 8.05% (2.3% null). 93.10% owned their{homes,}4.6% rented and 2.3% were neither. 3.45% owned no car, 59.77% 1 car, 34.48% 2{cars. {"Luxury" items owned}are - freezer 89.66%, video 55.17%, washing machine 88.51%, computer 44.83%, dishwasher 10.34%, caravan 13.79% and boat 6.9%.Level of concern on local issues- Chalk excavation - 27.59%,extension of paint factory - 25.29%,amenities for young people -75.86%,transport-54.02% vandalism - 64.37%,further house building-27.59%.(Compiled by R.Mellor)
